refnamediv.refpurpose: Creates an RCC shape that fills in the hole of a specified TOR.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Creates an RCC shape that fills in the hole of a specified TOR.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the tor-rcc command to create an RCC to fill in the hole of a TOR.

example.title: Create an RCC shape to fill in the hole of a TOR.
example.para: Creates an RCC named rcc.s to fill in the hole in the middle of tor.s.
